Pixie Hates Gameshark!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Game Shark Codes & Dex Drive Saves: Pixie Hates Gameshark!
By Nate Railsback on Tuesday, July 17, 2001 - 07:34 pm:

I'm having a lot of problems with this Pixie/Wracky. After getting all the techniques I could without it, I decided to pick up the crossover techniques with a gameshark (the ones that would otherwise be impossible to get, like Death Final). However, rather than giving her the list of second-row moves, it actually DELETES Bang and Big Bang from her list to make her second slot empty during battle! However, it claims that she has everything when I look at her outside of battle. I've tried deleting lines of the code to make up for this, but it doesn't seem to work. It gives me Fire Breath in the 3rd range no problem, which is also a crossover technique, but when I try to modify the code to JUST get Firebreath, it junks the Bang moves again! What gives? DP or any other gameshark experts, could you help me out? I've tried this on a few other monsters to experiment, and it doesn't do this with any other species (although it will refuse to give me the bottom-left moves on many monsters' lists). Any help? Anyone?

By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, July 18, 2001 - 03:32 pm:

ya - fade started another thread that same day that i responded to at length, where he basically said "if you are gonna use endless resetting and bananas to max out a monster, why not just use a gameshark? they both are ways of cheating". [i am oversimplifying fade's message, i know]. many people responded with what they considered to be cheating and what was not. it appears, however, to have been deleted.
